item.title: CVE-2021-24562|2024-08-03T19:35:20.173Z -- unknown -- lms%20by%20lifterlms%20%E2%80%93%20online%20course%2C%20membership%20%26%20learning%20management%20system%20plugin%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The LMS by LifterLMS – Online Course, Membership & Learning Management System Plugin for WordPress plugin before 4.21.2 was affected by an IDOR issue, allowing students to see other student answers and grades
